ActionVisibility.name: ActionVisibility
ActionVisibility.description: This object serves as a junction to connect Account or Contact to other objects so that information in those other object can be used to define visibility rules for actions in the Dynamic Actions for Unified Health Scoring component.

AccountId.description: The account record of the subject.

ContactId.description: The contact record of the subject.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.
